ModMetaData.name: ConduitsStuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes vanilla conduits so that they can be made with stuff.
Health Flammable Beauty Steel conduit: 80 20% -2 Silver conduit: 56 20% -2 Gold conduit: 48 20% -2 Plasteel conduit: 225 10% -2 Uranium conduit: 200 0% -2
